channel.title: writing on Casey Williams
channel.description: Recent content in writing on Casey Williams

item.title: Weekly Post Challenge
item.description: I recently set the home page of my browser to be Hacker News . I found it to be a distraction free way of finding out interesting stuff that’s happening in the tech industry. Anyway, today I came across a post called I bought netflix.soy , a fantastic blog post written by Ben Stokes . I read Ben’s post and then took a wonder round the rest of the site.
